author: RippleTTV
description: A cog that removes the 'unverified' role from all users who have it when the !removenonverified command is used.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the RemoveNonVerified cog. Use the !removenonverified command to remove the 'unverified' role from all users who currently have it.
short: Remove 'unverified' role from all users who have it.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store or share any personal data.
